response.overview: Within the participation in the ninth session of the Dammam Theater Festival for short performances, director Maher Al-Ghanim presented a show «The show is still continuing», which summoned critic Ahmed Al-Mulla to say «the show is still continuing after rolling the top head towards the bottom of the stage or basement, where the echo of flogging and torture still reverberates in the place», adding «Maher Al-Ghanim, the director before the actor, presented a theatrical show, to say the least that it is crowded and hoarded with symbols and connotations until it almost crowded and collided with each other», and saw that the beginning of the show It was weaker than expected due to the density of signs and elements that decorated the first scene and continued throughout the show, as the shadow game came hesitant instead of being shocking and expressive with a depth that tightens the whole show, not to mention the dilemma of the suspended body that crossed the scene.
response.title: The Show Is Still Going On
